Topic.Title: Using Markdown in your post (just some links | HOW TO)

Posts.EditableText:
Hi all, 

I know these links are always on your page when posting, but I've had a few people ask how I was formatting things, so here are the links:

http://docs.textadventures.co.uk/forum/

https://daringfireball.net/projects/markdown/syntax
